title: intended-effect-statement
description: Represents the STIX 1.x statement type which uses a intended-effect-ov as the value

description.description: This property contains a prose description of the statement.

confidence.description: See confidence common property definition in section 3.2 of the STIX 2.1 specification.

value.description: This property contains the intended effect. It SHOULD be one of the values from intended-effect-ov
